job_purpose: Designing and developing scalable backend systems for fleet management and autonomy solutions in the mining industry.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and build backend services and APIs meeting functional and non-functional requirements.
Own complex stories from design through deployment.
Participate in design reviews and contribute to architectural decisions.
Improve codebase maintainability through refactoring and better observability.
Mentor junior developers and promote best practices in software design and development.
Collaborate with domain experts to integrate shared frameworks and libraries.
Proactively raise technical risks and issues with Tech Leads.
required_qualifications: 5+ years' experience in software development roles, ideally in complex, distributed environments.
Strong experience with C# .NET Core, Entity Framework, RabbitMQ, and SQL Server.
Skilled in unit testing and working in microservice architectures.
Experience with Docker or Kubernetes for containerization.
Familiarity with Linux systems and Akka.NET is desirable.
company_details: A major player in the mining industry delivering cutting-edge automation solutions for fleet management and autonomy. The company values technical leadership, clean code, and innovation in pushing the boundaries of mining technology.
